mapper.select: select id, type, code, name, certificate_no, gender, native_province, native_county, age, speciality_name, speciality_levels, school_name, graduate_date, remark, operator, update_date, enabled_flag from stu_student_certificate_old where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into stu_student_certificate_old ( type, code, name, certificate_no, gender, native_province, native_county, age, speciality_name, speciality_levels, school_name, graduate_date, remark, operator, update_date ) values ( #{type}, #{code}, #{name}, #{certificateNo}, #{gender}, #{nativeProvince}, #{nativeCounty}, #{age}, #{specialityName}, #{specialityLevels}, #{schoolName}, #{graduateDate}, #{remark}, #{operator}, now() )
mapper.update: update stu_student_certificate_old set enabled_flag =0 where id = #{value}
